org.missile.model.template
Interface GameElementObserver

All Known Implementing Classes:
ExplosionsTracker, GameEngine
public interface GameElementObserver

Interface which defines the needed methods to be implemented for the observers of the GameElementTracker

The subscribers will be notified when a element has been added or removed and therefore they could act in consecuence.

Author:
luizcarlos
